title: AX Center: From Digital to AI Transformation
summary: Renamed Digital Transformation (DX) organization to AI Transformation (AX) Center, targeting 30% productivity improvement across all operations.

content.whatItIs: LG Electronics rebranded its Digital Transformation organization as the 'AX Center' (AI Transformation Center), signaling a strategic shift from general digitization to AI-first operations. The company set a concrete goal of 30% productivity improvement across all business units through AI deployment.
howItWorks: Renamed existing DX organization to AX Center to signal strategic priority shift
Set measurable 30% productivity improvement target across all operations
Deployed AI across customer service, manufacturing, and product development
CEO publicly committed to AI transformation as company's primary strategic focus
content.coreInsight: The DX→AX rebrand represents more than naming: it signals that AI is no longer a component of digital transformation but the primary driver. By setting specific productivity targets, LG creates accountability for AI deployment outcomes.
content.keyMetrics: 30% productivity improvement target; company-wide AI transformation mandate
